epg.showname: History's Greatest Escapes with Morgan Freeman
epg.description: Celebrated actor and host Morgan Freeman revisits some of the most daring jailbreaks conducted by ingenuous prisoners from across the globe.
epg.episode_desc: During World War II, Nazi death camps terrorise Europe. Subsequently, at Sobibor in Poland, Jewish prisoners forced to operate the killing machinery refuse to accept their fate.

epg.showname: History's Greatest Heists With Pierce Brosnan
epg.description: The host sheds light on elaborate and infamous heists that have taken place throughout history and the masterminds behind them.
epg.starCast: Brent Picha, William Sibley, Bobby Williams
epg.episode_desc: Daring criminals burrow beneath London's streets to infiltrate a Lloyds Bank vault. However, their heist takes an unexpected turn when a radio hobbyist stumbles upon their communications.

epg.description: Popular pawn merchants from a grand shop in Las Vegas connect with fans in eight different cities and acquire some of the most remarkable items.
A biologist and a professional animal handler set out to create a pain index. To do this, they allow deadly animals to bite or sting them, after which they rate them on a scale for future reference.
epg.episode_desc: Rob and Adam take on Blue tang, peacock mantis shrimp and double bar rabbitfish which are commonly seen in home aquariums.

epg.showname: Forged In Fire: Knife Or Death
epg.description: Top bladesmiths from different walks of life compete to create the best weapons and prove their effectiveness in a series of daunting challenges.
epg.episode_desc: Competitors test the mettle of a hybrid Yatagan sabre, a two-handed Bowie knife and other bladed weapons. Later, a female bladesmith comes close to a first-time achievement.

epg.showname: History's Greatest Of All Time With Peyton Manning
epg.description: Host Peyton Manning unveils some of the greatest inventions of all time and experts share the lesser know details about it.
epg.episode_desc: From Twizzlers to Gummy Bears, Host Peyton Manning expertly compiles and presents a list of the top ten candies of all time.

epg.description: Hosts Muninder Singh Chowdhry and Vishakha Dholakia Chowdhry give tips on imparting a magical makeover to homes with little money.
epg.episode_desc: The designers meet a retired colonel and his daughters and try to bridge the gap between them through their work.

epg.description: Danny Koker and his crew are fans of the coolest American cars and are involved in the restoration and modification of classic cars and bikes.
epg.episode_desc: Danny tries to salvage the crew's derailed project on the 1962 Cadillac; Ryan tries to make up for her mistake with the Cadillac by finding flips for the shop.

epg.description: Mike Wolfe, Frank Fritz and Danielle Colby-Cushman recycle and transform forgotten relics, old electronics and vehicles into beautiful collectibles while meeting other collectors.
The documentarian sets on a fast-paced journey to look into the pasts of legendary companies to fascinating subjects like UFOs and the daily lives of billionaires.
Renowned USA-based chef Samira Nanda explores the palaces of India in search of the culinary secrets of the nation's royal families.

Professional buyers go to auctions and explore storage units in search of lucrative and interesting items that could fetch them a big profit.

epg.description: A group of experts tries to restore American vintage items to their original state while facing a number of challenges during the job.
epg.episode_desc: Dale finds a 1940 Harley-Davidson WLD engine and tries to restore it; a customer asks Steve to transform a 1959 Cadillac tailfin into a kitschy couch; Bodie tries to revive a 1963 Ford Galaxie.

epg.episode_desc: Danny and his crew recount the greatest paint jobs in the history of their company, which include a 1971 Roadrunner, a truck owned by heavy metal musician Rob Zombie and a Harley.

epg.description: A comprehensive compilation of some of the best episodes from the reality show 'Pawn Stars', in which the Harrison family buys and sells fascinating artefacts in their family-owned pawn shop.

epg.episode_desc: Dave sees his profits grow when the buyers go to Torrance. Meanwhile, Mary finds clothes that do not fit her and Kenny tries to become an early bird.

epg.description: A compilation of the best episodes of 'OMG! Yeh Mera India', wherein the host sheds light on several inspiring and exciting stories from across India.
The host provides an insight into how gadgets from the past and the present have impacted society and brought about far-reaching changes in human lives.
epg.episode_desc: The host visits the McIlhenny Company of Louisiana, home of sizzling Tabasco sauce, before heading to McCormick's, a leading spice manufacturing company in Baltimore, Maryland.

epg.description: Professional buyers go to auctions and explore storage units in search of lucrative and interesting items that could fetch them a big profit.

epg.episode_desc: The presenter highlights peculiar inventions from history like baby gas masks and slug-powered robots. Additionally, these odd creations include inflatable planes and coffin alarms.

epg.showname: History's Greatest Escapes with Morgan Freeman
epg.description: Celebrated actor and host Morgan Freeman revisits some of the most daring jailbreaks conducted by ingenuous prisoners from across the globe.
epg.episode_desc: In French Guiana, when petty thief Rene Belbenoit faces harsh imprisonment, determined to break free, he endures years of gruelling conditions and attempts numerous daring escapes.
